column4: hey i have really slow wifi internet even with ipv6 blacklisted. anyone else have this?
was there an update to jaunty recently that broke the ath9k wireless drivers?
dexter: whatever they say, don't use ndiswrapper. it is the worst written driver on the planet
ok... i'm not verry experienced, but i can handle this with some working ideas
sorry just thought i would save you the hassle
what was your card again/
lshw? :D
i'm on my bro's pc, so it doesn't have isa support. i'll run the live cd from my pc, i'll get back to you soon
thanks
are you still here?
yeah i'm still here. why do you ask?
sorry which command? i asked what the command was to install the noveau driver
sorry man its 6 in the morning lol
you asked me to type a command and show you what is printed on the screen. and about that driver, where do i get it from? does apt-get gives me that driver?
lspci shows you what hardware you have
something about lh... idk... i had a problem with an isa net card... in case you fogot :D
first i need to know what kind of card it is
do you know by chance what the card is called?
if you don't, typing lspci in terminal will give you a big list of hardware devices
i'll do that now
but is an ISA :(
sorry this may be going beyond my knowledge of computers. what is ISA?
